source.name: Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11
source.description: The "Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11" view  gives the expenditure amounts for "above-the-line" components of the administrative budget before adjustments for Reimbursable and Fee income in nominal terms.

datasets.name: World Bank Expenditures By Program
datasets.description:
The World Bank Expenditure by Program data give the administrative expenditure for Bank (BB) funds and Reimbursable funds from FY06 to FY11.  These data are based on the World Bank Expenditure by Program - FY06-11 table from the Annual Report 2011 http://go.worldbank.org/D74CFKTQ80 .  

BB funds are authorized by the Bank's Board of Directors for general purpose Bank operations.  Reimbursable funds are received from external sources as reimbursements for special purpose program outputs or other services provided by the Bank.

All data are presented in nominal amounts.

datasets.name: Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11
datasets.description: The "Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11" view  gives the expenditure amounts for "above-the-line" components of the administrative budget before adjustments for Reimbursable and Fee income in nominal terms.

datasets.name: FY 2011 WB Program Expenditure Aggregate
datasets.description:
The World Bank Expenditure by Program data give the administrative expenditure for Bank (BB) funds and Reimbursable funds from FY06 to FY11.  These data are based on the World Bank Expenditure by Program - FY06-11 table from the Annual Report 2011 http://go.worldbank.org/D74CFKTQ80 .  

BB funds are authorized by the Bank's Board of Directors for general purpose Bank operations.  Reimbursable funds are received from external sources as reimbursements for special purpose program outputs or other services provided by the Bank.

All data are presented in nominal amounts.

datasets.name: Total Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11
datasets.description: The "Total Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11" view reflects the "World Bank Expenditures by Program - Fiscal 2005-11" table in The World Bank Annual Report 2011.  The data are in nominal terms.

datasets.name: Finance Expenditure (FY05-11)
datasets.description:
The World Bank Expenditure by Program data give the administrative expenditure for Bank (BB) funds and Reimbursable funds from FY06 to FY11.  These data are based on the World Bank Expenditure by Program - FY06-11 table from the Annual Report 2011 http://go.worldbank.org/D74CFKTQ80 .  

BB funds are authorized by the Bank's Board of Directors for general purpose Bank operations.  Reimbursable funds are received from external sources as reimbursements for special purpose program outputs or other services provided by the Bank.

All data are presented in nominal amounts.

datasets.name: Net Administrative Expenditure - FY05  to FY11
datasets.description: The "Net Administrative Expenditure - FY05 to FY11" view gives the portion of the World Bank's administrative expenditures that have been subject to flat real growth since FY05.  The data are in nominal terms.
